description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 2no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion. Conversion of existing garage to habitable space with associated changes to fenestration.
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with the installation of 2no front rooflights to facilitate a loft conversion and the conversion of the existing garage to habitable space with associated changes to fenestration falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A, B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Please confirm the proposal as the existing plans do not match the site photographs. The plans show a gable end roof and full width dormer roof extension with front rooflights. The photographs show a hipped roof with a small rear dormer roof extension. The existing plans must show the existing situation and the planning application must include all proposals.
